General.Name: Cipta Selera Murni Pt
General.Description: PT Cipta Selera Murni Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the fast food restaurant business in Indonesia. PT Cipta Selera Murni Tbk was founded in 1983 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Cikini Raya No. 60A, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10330
